description: Configuration bundle for a set of honeypot services with unique vulnerabilities.

services.description: HTTP service vulnerable to cross site scripting.
services.cve_description: MolecularFaces before 0.3.0 is vulnerable to cross site scripting. A remote attacker can execute arbitrary JavaScript in the context of a victim browser via crafted molfiles.

plugin.prompt: Respond to a potential XSS attack on an HTTP service.

services.description: HTTP service vulnerable to reflected cross-site scripting.
services.cve_description: The Co-marquage service-public.fr plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of add_query_arg without appropriate escaping.

services.description: SSH service vulnerable to authorization bypass.
services.cve_description: CWE-639: Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key vulnerability exists allowing an authorized attacker to modify values outside their privileges.

plugin.prompt: Respond to unauthorized access attempts on an SSH service.

services.description: TCP service vulnerable to SQL injection.
services.cve_description: A vulnerability classified as critical found in PHPGurukul Complaint Management System 1.0 allows SQL injection through /admin/complaint-search.php.
services.banner: Welcome to the vulnerable TCP service.

services.description: SSH service vulnerable to information exposure.
services.cve_description: The Envo Extra plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Information Exposure due to insufficient restrictions, allowing access to private posts.
